splash 0.1.0
  • Reference

Splash

Source: R/splash.R
splash.Rd

When supplied with the path to an h2o mojo (.zip) file, this function builds an interactive document (.Rmd file), provides an h2o-genmodel.jar file, and launches the interactive document using rmarkdown::render().

splash(
  mojo_file_path,
  output_file = "index.Rmd",
  overwrite = FALSE,
  title = "",
  author = "",
  date = "",
  rmd_output = "html_document",
  runtime = "shiny",
  rmd_run = TRUE
)

Arguments

mojo_file_path

The file path to the h2o model-optimized Java object (MOJO) zip file.
output_file

The name of the Rmd file to create.
overwrite

Whether to overwrite the output_file. Defaults to FALSE.
title

The YAML header `title`` for the Rmd output file.
author

The YAML header `author`` for the Rmd output file.
date

The YAML header `date`` for the Rmd output file.
rmd_output

The YAML header `output`` for the of Rmd output file.
runtime

The YAML runtime. Currently, only shiny is supported.
rmd_run

Whether to run the Rmd output file after creating it. Defaults to TRUE.

Details

If you set rmd_run to TRUE, note that this will change your working directory.

Contents
